mil7.7.6:2.2_1: yoginā yogāvacarena mettābhāvanāya sadevako loko nibbāpetabbo.
mil7.7.6:2.3_0: Idaṁ, mahārāja, meghassa dutiyaṁ aṅgaṁ gahetabbaṁ.
mil7.7.6:3.1_0: Puna caparaṁ, mahārāja, megho sabbabījāni viruhāpeti;
mil7.7.6:3.2_1: yoginā yogāvacarena sabbasattānaṁ saddhaṁ uppādetvā taṁ saddhābījaṁ tīsu sampattīsu ropetabbaṁ,
mil7.7.6:3.3_0: Idaṁ, mahārāja, meghassa tatiyaṁ aṅgaṁ gahetabbaṁ.
mil7.7.6:4.1_1: megho ututo samuṭṭhahitvā dharaṇitalaruhe tiṇarukkhalatāgumbaosadhivanappatayo parirakkhati;
mil7.7.6:4.2_1: yoginā yogāvacarena yoniso manasikāraṁ nibbattetvā tena yoniso manasikārena samaṇadhammo parirakkhitabbo,
mil7.7.6:5.1_1: megho vassamāno naditaḷākapokkharaṇiyo kandarapadarasarasobbhaudapānāni ca paripūreti udakadhārāhi;
mil7.7.6:5.2_1: yoginā yogāvacarena āgamapariyattiyā dhammameghamabhivassayitvā adhigamakāmānaṁ mānasaṁ paripūrayitabbaṁ.
